simple_instruction_controller: You unlocked an {c_highlight}Aspect{/c} that can be imprinted onto equipment. Press {hotkey:Map} and navigate to Collections to view it in the {c_highlight}Codex of Power{/c}.
simple_instruction: You unlocked an {c_highlight}Aspect{/c} that can be imprinted onto equipment. Press {hotkey:Collections} to view it in the {c_highlight}Codex of Power{/c}.
title: Aspects
